explains: v. 崇拜；钟爱（adore 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Americans adore me and will go on adoring me until I say something nice about them.
sentences.cn: 美国人崇拜我，并将继续崇拜我，直到我说他们的好话。

sentences.en: She can still pull in adoring audiences.
sentences.cn: 她依然能够吸引崇拜她的观众。

sentences.en: She set herself to adoring Marius as something charming, luminous, and impossible.
sentences.cn: 她开始把马吕斯当作一种动人的、光明灿烂的、不可能的东西来崇拜。
